message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.MM 

The paper deals with the problem of novelty detection in images and videos, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves training two deep networks using a generative adversarial approach, which is a popular technique in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the challenges of training one-class classifiers, which is a topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of deep networks and generative models also suggests a connection to neural networks (cs.NE). Finally, the experiments involve image and video datasets, which are commonly used in multimedia research (cs.MM).
